# Trello API - Async Python SDK client (using aiohttp)

Simple and fast client to call rest-api endpoints `"https://trello.com/1/` using aiohttp package. View at:https://pypi.org/project/python-trello-api/## How to install```bashpip3 install python-trello-api```## UsageMain example:```pythonimport asynciofrom api_trello import TrelloClientTOKEN = "12345:YOUR_TOKEN"APP_HOSTNAME = "https://YOUR_HOSTNAME.ngrok.io"trello = TrelloClient(token=TGBOT_TOKEN)async def main_async(): passif __name__ == "__main__": asyncio.run_until_complete(main_async())```### Docs1.
